key_talking_points: Edmonton's Cody Ceci was penalized for holding-the-stick against Florida's Sam Reinhart at 17:06 remaining in the first period.
Florida had 3 shots on goal between 17:03 and 16:31 remaining in the first period.
Edmonton's Connor McDavid was penalized for tripping Florida's Carter Verhaeghe at 16:28 remaining in the first period. Florida will go on the power play.
for_commentary_agent.context: The game is fast-paced with multiple shots and penalties. Focus on the implications of the upcoming power play.

game_context.game_situation: Edmonton penalty, Florida on power play

high_intensity_events.summary: Penalty: Cody Ceci (EDM) holding-the-stick against Sam Reinhart (FLA).
Penalty: Connor McDavid (EDM) tripping against Carter Verhaeghe (FLA).
Shot on goal by Evan Bouchard (EDM).
